findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows minting an unlimited number of sundae tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Reentrancy in transfer and transferFrom functions
findings.description: The reentrancy vulnerability exists in the transfer and transferFrom functions, allowing an attacker to drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected function approve
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function increaseAllowance
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to drain the allowance of a user.

findings.title: Unprotected function decreaseAllowance
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected function burn
findings.description: The burn function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected function swap
findings.description: The 'swap' function is unprotected and can be exploited by attackers.
findings.function: swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH, swapExactTokensForETH, swapETHForExactTokens

findings.title: Unprotected function skim
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, which may lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected function sync
findings.description: The 'sync' function does not have any protection against unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected function initialize
findings.description: The function 'initialize' is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified which can lead to centralization of power and increase the risk of rug pull scams.

findings.title: Reentrancy in permit function
findings.description: The permit function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Reentrancy in mint function
findings.description: The mint function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.
